Class Points

java.lang.Object
com.FeedEmGreens.HealthyAura.entity.Points
@Entity public class Points extends Object
Entity representing a user's reward points balance within the HealthyAura system.

Each Points record tracks the accumulated, redeemed, and available reward points of a user. Points are earned through actions such as writing reviews, engaging with the platform, or participating in health-related activities, and can be redeemed for rewards or discounts.

Entries are stored in the points table, linked one-to-one with a Users record.

Example usage:

  • Updating total points when a user posts a review
  • Redeeming points for a reward through the RewardsController
  • Displaying the userâ€™s current balance on their profile
Since:
2025-11-07
